turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order two medium pizzas with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order one meat lovers pizza. On the second pizza I would like green peppers, bacon, and sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 medium gluten free pizzas, one meat lovers and one with green peppers bacon and sausage.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $38, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you. That is all, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?
